meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hilarious.
meanings.sent1: Her jokes always bring a lot of hilariousnesses to our gatherings.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's performance was filled with hilariousnesses that had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent3: The hilariousnesses of the situation made it impossible to keep a straight face.
meanings.sent4: His storytelling had a touch of hilariousnesses that painted vivid images in our minds.
meanings.sent5: The movie's plot twists added a layer of unexpected hilariousnesses.

meanings.definition: Instances of being extremely funny or amusing.
meanings.sent1: The party was full of hilariousnesses, with guests sharing funny stories.
meanings.sent2: Watching comedy shows always guarantees a good dose of hilariousnesses.
meanings.sent3: The children's playful antics brought a wave of hilariousnesses to the room.
meanings.sent4: The sitcom's witty dialogues created a wave of hilariousnesses in the audience.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's jokes were a fountain of endless hilariousnesses.
